title: Add token counting to Evolution Service
description: Add token counting for each LLM call in EvolutionService using tiktoken. Return token usage alongside evolved playbook.

title: Write unit tests for Evolution Service
description: Write unit tests for the Evolution Service wrapper in tests/test_evolution/

title: Document token economics analysis
description: Run sample ACE evolution loop with token counting, document tokens per agent call, calculate cost per evolution, create pricing recommendations

title: Set up MCP server core
description: Install and configure mcp package, create MCP server entry point in platform/mcp/server.py with proper configuration (host, port, transport)

title: Implement MCP authentication middleware
description: Create API key based authentication middleware for MCP server in platform/mcp/auth.py

title: Implement get_playbook MCP tool
description: Implement get_playbook tool in platform/mcp/tools.py with playbook_id (required) and section (optional) parameters. Returns playbook content as structured text.

title: Implement report_outcome MCP tool
description: Implement report_outcome tool with playbook_id, task_description, outcome (success/failure/partial), reasoning_trace, and notes parameters. Persists to database.

title: Implement list_playbooks MCP tool
description: Implement list_playbooks tool with include_starters parameter. Returns array of {id, name, description, last_updated, bullet_count}

title: Implement trigger_evolution MCP tool
description: Implement trigger_evolution tool that queues Celery job. Returns {job_id, status, estimated_completion}

title: Add MCP tools input validation and error handling
description: Add comprehensive input validation and meaningful error messages for all MCP tools

title: Create SQLAlchemy database models
description: Implement SQLAlchemy models for User, Playbook, Outcome, EvolutionJob, and UsageRecord in platform/db/models.py

title: Create Metered LLM Client
description: Create MeteredLLMClient in platform/core/llm_proxy.py that wraps OpenAI client, counts tokens for each request/response, logs usage to UsageRecord table

title: MCP integration testing
description: Test MCP server connection with mcp CLI tools, test with Claude Code as MCP client

title: Document MCP integration steps
description: Document MCP integration steps and create example agent configuration

title: Set up FastAPI application

title: Implement JWT authentication

description: Create POST /auth/register endpoint for user registration

title: Implement auth login endpoint
description: Create POST /auth/login endpoint that returns JWT token

title: Implement auth me endpoint
description: Create GET /auth/me endpoint to get current user info

title: Implement playbook CRUD endpoints

title: Implement playbook outcomes endpoint

title: Implement playbook evolutions endpoint
